body: The wielder can cast up to three spells per day with a one-step increase in their range category (such as from close to medium, or medium to long) as though using the Reach Spell feat.
name: Reach Metamagic Rod
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Equipment/Rules/Rings/Rods and Staves/Rods/Metamagic Rods/Reach Metamagic Rod
